attributes.title: almost gave me a brain tumor
attributes.review: the WORST app on the appstore. first of all took months to download and second of all the content was so dull and brainwashing that it almost gave me a brain tumor. i didn’t even know that was possible but guess what, it 100% is. i was scrolling through the app and i was met with content that was so absurd and far from the truth that my brain glitched. i felt a terrible migraine that lasted for weeks so i went to the doctors and they removed what they called the “cheeto tumor”, it’s a tumor that trump’s propaganda puts into people’s minds making them lose all common sense. this app is dangerous and should be taken down, i was one of the lucky ones.

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.review: horrible app. it wouldn’t load AT ALL and i had fast wifi. started playing horrible noises and showed horrible images. steals your info and sells it. takes to to p0*n sites automatically even though I’VE NEVER BEEN TO THOSE SITES IN MY LIFE. a few moments later some 🍊 orange dressed people kidnapped me and told me to go back to my country even though i was born in the us. please do not install this horrible app and if you do please give it a bad review because it’s what it deserves. i started receiving death threats and when i called the police they said they knew about it but didn’t want to help me at all. i’m currently in intense therapy because of this app.

attributes.title: Do Not Download!!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app because I wanted to support my number 1 President 🇺🇸, but sadly 😔, I was mistaken.😤😰 The app took WEEKS to download⁉️ 😬😬😬 When it finally did download, my phone 📱 glitched out 😱 and now I can’t get oranges 🍊🍊🍊 and the United States flag 🇺🇸 off of my screen‼️‼️ DO NOT DOWNLOAD YOU WILL GET A VIRUS !! 😡😡😡 I cannot believe OUR WONDERFUL PRESIDENT 🥰 would let something like this slide. 😢😭😭 I am distraught by the poor quality of this app. 😥😥 I expect BETTER from the ruling class, not this sad 😞 excuse for an app. 😵Someone was clearly BRIBED 🤑🤑💸💸💰 into making this a horrible 😫 app, it at the very least HACKED. 😈😈😈 Once 👆 again, do NOT download this app, you WILL REGRET IT‼️‼️‼️ 😭😰🤬

attributes.title: Horrible 🍊
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to support our wonderful president 🍊 it took months to download and I couldn’t do anything else while it downloaded I had to get another phone when it finally downloaded this awful music started playing that left me deaf there was an ugly picture of an orange with corn hair it was so bad I went blind I used to wear glasses before but it wasn’t that bad not I can’t see at all they asked me to put in my phone number after I did my FBI agent crawled out of my phone and broke both my knee caps afterwards they stripped naked and ran around my house screaming he then proceeded to slap my mom and eat my cat worst app ever I do not recommend

attributes.title: Trump
attributes.review:
This app is horrible they’re going to give you rewards am I a child do I get a popsicle no I don’t like a popsicle I want a popsicle but I do not get a popsicle. It has nothing special about it didn’t even say thank you for downloading this app this app is horrible. I’m telling you now do not waste your time is horrible it’s supports this “president “ .Who may I just add is a horrible he’s just horrible , and if you have half a brain do not download this app use half of that brain to do something productive like go downstairs and eat the food OK thank you do not download this app.

             p.s trump is an incompetent , imbecile with no brain cells also he’s a Nimrod .OK bye thanks 💋

attributes.title: it broke my house!
attributes.review: bad! the app made my phone break 😡 and it also almost killed me. i was walking my pet caterpillar 🐛 and my phone jumped out of my hands, so the caterpillar ate it and morphed into donald trumpet wannabe 🤬 it then almost ate MEEEE. so then the house set on fire after my caterpillar killed my worm and it’s all because of this terrible app! ps you can’t take down tiktok, we’re too strong. my house is now dead, and it’s ALL THANKS TO THE ORANGE GUY! it’s payback time 🥰✌️so im taking this app down with my fellow friends here, and you can’t stop us. take down our app, take down your app. plus we’re moving platforms if you try to stop us anyways 🥰✌️😊😤🤮✨💜 love from a kpop stann 💜✌️✨✨✨🥺👌💜

attributes.title: absolutely horrible app 🥰🙂✨⭐️
attributes.review:
so basically I downloaded this app thinking that it would be amazing but turns out it was amazingly horrible 🧚🏾🥰✨. turns out the app is made in loving memory of a racist✨ homophobic 🥰 Cheeto puff that is very 🤏.       ( yes everyone has seen that picture) as soon as I opened the app it started suggesting tanning products and blond wigs. I don’t see why I should tan seeing as I am already brown and have a head full of hair. I do not appreciate that the app saved his leaked pic as my lock screen and I can’t seem to remove it! i hate you🥰✨! 

                                                            Yours sincerely,
                                       Cheeto puff hate club🥰✨

attributes.title: ITS A VIRUS ‼️‼️
attributes.review: i downloaded this app and my phone began buzzing before i put any information in. multiple spam companies were sending me promotions and links that when clicked on gave viruses to my tablet. once i tried to build a profile and as soon as i put in my ethnicity it began to give off a ringing noise that caused all the ants and roaches to go to the tablet and after 3 minutes the pitch changed and was so unbearable i had to leave the room. in addition to this i had to take my dogs to the vet after i discovered that their eardrums burst. do not purchase this app because it will cause damage and your information is being spread out.

attributes.title: pee🧚🏼‍♀️
attributes.review: this app smells like pee its really disgusing it broke my phone and im typing this from my new phone 🙄🙄🙄 DO NOT GET THIS!!!!!!! my dog threw up from seing this app. IT DID NOT PASS THE VIBE CHECK. please don’t download IT WILL RUIN YOUR LIFE!! i thouht itnwould be a good idea to download it because i wanted to see if there were picture of 🍊💩 ( sorry i cant bring myself to type his name🤢🤢) to photoshop. the moment i opened it i was so scared. im traumatized for life. save yourself by not downloading this. i have been there and pleas please dont download. save yourself the time and get tik tok😏 my guinea pig ran away from me when i showed her the app. poor thing😔 this app is sooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooooo DISTUSTING!!!!!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: this app took years to download. it was unbearable.. and i couldn’t do anything else waiting for it to download. The music was terrible. My cat ran away when i got on the app and the music started playing. My brother starting crying blood and now he’s at the hospital. My dads ears started bleeding so bad that he’s deaf now. i can barely hear through my right ear because of that. Don’t download this app unless you want severe medical issues. even one of my bones in my leg immediately turned to dust when i got on. i’m in the hospital now trying to fight for my life because of this app. my heart stopped beating for two minutes because of this app. DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!!
